description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Lakes Entrance, Australia. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Lakes Entrance Rooms, Suites and Apartments with Indoor Pool, Onsite Restaurant & Parking
hotels.description: Perched on the foreshore of Lakes Entrance, this stay offers sweeping views over two scenic arms of the Gippsland Lakes. Start your mornings with nature walks along Ninety Mile Beach, take a short trip to the charming village of Metung for lakeside exploring, then pick up freshly caught seafood direct from local fishers. Take a walk to the lively main street, home to buzzing restaurants and bars, then unwind with a rejuvenating soak at Metung Hot Springs - the perfect way to relax aching muscles. Facilities include an indoor heated pool and hot tub, as well as onsite dining at Albert & Co, serving a menu of local favourites. Nearby attractions include Ninety Mile Beach, the Griffiths Sea Shell Museum and scenic paddleboat rides, and walking paths are also easily accessible for those looking to explore on foot.

seo.title: Hotel a Lakes Entrance - Australia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trova i migliori hotel a Lakes Entrance, Australia con offerte esclusive. Prenota la tua fuga perfetta con fino al 60% di sconto.
